AUTHOR: Kowlin
INSTALL_MSG:
Thanks for installing GithubCards
This cog will block any invite link that isn't send by a mod/admin

For setup instructions please see the GitHub Wiki(<https://github.com/Kowlin/refactored-cogs/wiki>)
For support: <https://support.kowlin.xyz>

If you like my work and want to support me, please consider becoming a Patron over at <https://patreon.com/kowlin>
NAME: GithubCards
SHORT: Embed Github issues on your discord chat.
DESCRIPTION:
Ever wanted to embed a github issue?! Well **now** you can! With GitHubCards, this sweet cog allows you to embed any issue from any public repo you like by using a unique prefix!
*Warning: GithubCards will blow your mind!*
